transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Namaskar Priyavrat sir.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Abhishek baat kar raha hu sir, aapke account sambhalta hu IndiaMART mein.
Customer: Haan boliye na.
Executive: Aap Priyavrat sir hi baat kar rahe hai ya koi aur baat kar rahe hai sir?
Customer: Haan haan nahi nahi bataiye.
Executive: Accha accha accha. Actually baat ye thi sir ki aapka jo yaha pe mail laga hua hai na wo actually full ho gaya tha to.
Executive: To wo mail hi verify karane ke liye maine call kiya tha aapko.
Customer: Kaunsa mail hai?
Executive: Mai bata deta hu sir ek baar.
Executive: Sir ye aapki mail hai ye Priyavrat Kumar wali.
Customer: Usko change kar dijiye.
Executive: Wo sir actually hamare paas access nahi hota sir.
Customer: Kya karna hai bataiye aapne kisliye phone kiya?
Executive: Aap ek baar aap maine wo mail hi verify karane ke liye call kiya hai kyunki sir aapka jo ye coms, aires wagera in sab ke jo notification hai na sir ye wali price bid aayi hai, itne send kiya hai, ye itne send kiya hai, wo sab mail pe hi aati hai sir.
Customer: To aapko notification usko usko usko change karna hai wo abhi use nahi kar rahe hai.
Executive: Accha accha accha accha use nahi kar rahe hai sir ek baar aap apna application open kar sakte hai? 10 second mein change ho jayega.
Customer: Ho jata hai sir.
Executive: Application open?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: IndiaMART ka?
Customer: Haan ji sir. Ab ek minute rukiye mai aap ek mai conference pe leta hu.
(silence)
Automated message: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Customer: Anand ji.
Customer: Ji sir.
Customer: Ye IndiaMART se hai line pe. Aap bataiye sir aap khol lijiye IndiaMART ka portal usme mail ID change kar dijiye to mai isi digit you dal dijiye.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan inko bata dijiye. Haan Anand ji ek baar apna mail ID open kijiye wo IndiaMART ke application open kijiye sir.
(silence)
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Ji sir ek minute open kar rahe hai sir.
Customer: Ji ji ji kar lijiye koi dikkat nahi.
Customer: Haan boliye to koi nahi sir.
(silence)
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ek minute sir open kar rahe hai.
Customer: Hello haan ji sir. Kis mein open kiya hai sir aapne mobile phone mein?
Customer: Google Chrome mein.
Executive: System mein? Google Chrome mein sir.
Customer: System mein hai na?
Executive: Ji ji ji system mein open kiya na profile pe click karo sir.
Customer: Haan profile tab pe open karo click karo left hand side mein second number pe dikhai dega sir aapko option.
Executive: Hello. Open kar liya hu sir profile wala. Haan profile pe click kiya na abhi dekho aapka naam dikhai de raha hoga sir waha pe hai na. Uske right hand side mein corner mein dekho edit ka option dikhai de raha hoga sir edit ka.
Executive: Upar ki taraf corner mein. Ji.
Executive: Thik hai abhi dekho sir aapko yaha pe details dikhai de rahi hai na aapki email ID dikhai de rahi hai na yaha pe. Ji.
Executive: Haan waha pe email ID pe click karke aapko jo new email ID update karni hai wo yaha pe daliye.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Thik hai sir OTP gaya OTP gaya.
Executive: Ji sir haan OTP aayega sir OTP dalna isme.
(silence)
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan hello. Haan ji sir hua update sir?
Customer: Ek minute sir.
Executive: Ji ji.
(silence)
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan sir. Haan sir wo jo wo jo OTP ja raha hai wo mail pe aa raha hai ya number pe ja raha hai primary pe?
Customer: Number pe sir ja raha hai sir.
Executive: Haan number pe ja raha hai na to wo number se OTP lena padega sir aapko.
Executive: Kiska number hai usme?
Customer: Haan ji. Office office ka hi sir number hai kya?
Executive: Ek ek kaam. Ek kaam kijiye mai batau sir ye jo number aa gaya aa gaya sir thik hai.
Executive: Email ID.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Smart plus a hai hum PNG dhoondh rahe hai na. WhatsApp pe kitne number hai tere paas?
Customer: WhatsApp pe kya aagaya isko? 36 number pe aagaya.
Executive: Nahi file bhi to bheji hai.
Executive: Download pe mil jayenge na aaj.
Customer: Kitna time lagega ye?
Executive: Sir ka alternate se to hatana padega na sir ka phir tabhi na lega primary pe. Alternate pe company ka chahiye na.
Executive: Aaj problem nahi na hai?
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan sir.
Executive: Haan sir ho gaya?
Executive: Bas sir. Ho gaya lagbhag. Ek ek ek ki wale ka. Ek baar na Priyavrat sir ek baar na Anand ji ka number bhi sir mere ko bata de to mai direct inke saath hi coordinate kar leta agar ye.
Customer: Anand ji number de dijiye apna. 790.
Customer: 790.
Customer: 3300.
Customer: 3300.
Customer: 590.
Customer: 590.
Executive: 7903300590 right?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Okay sir.
Executive: Ho jaye to bata dena sir agar na ho to ek baar mere ko call kar lena mai kara dunga sir thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Okay ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to change the email ID.



Resolution:

- Executive guided to change email ID through application.

- Customer updated the email ID.

- Customer shared contact number of Anand.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to call if issue is not resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- email id, application, profile
